subcategory.name: FAQs
subcategory.description: FAQ section examples for Tailwind CSS, designed and built by the creators of the framework.
subcategory.introduction: Use these Tailwind CSS FAQ examples to share answers to common questions that visitors might have after browsing your website. These FAQ examples are designed and built by the Tailwind CSS team, and include a variety of different styles and layouts.

snippet.name: html
snippet.preview:
Frequently asked questions

Can’t find the answer you’re looking for? Reach out to our customer support team.
